So, Each Jar Sells For:$1400318-$50/$jars=-$1399868/jar(approx.) [We subtract sell price because its negative]
Now lets use same formula but calculating profit earned using Total sold jars amount:-Profit=(total sale – expense)/no_of_units=> Profit=(($50*NumberOfUnits)-
